text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Commercial motor vehicle" means any motor vehicle used or maintained for the transportation of persons or property that:
has 2 axles and an operating or registered gross vehicle weight that exceeds 26,000 pounds;
has 3 or more axles; or
is used in combination with another vehicle and has an operating or registered gross combined weight that exceeds 26,000 pounds.
"Motor carrier" means a person who operates or causes the operation of a commercial motor vehicle on a highway in this State.

"Motor carrier" includes:
a lessor of a commercial motor vehicle who provides or buys the motor fuel used to operate the vehicle or pays for it as a part of rental or other costs; and
a lessee whose lease entitles the lessee to receive a credit or refund for motor fuel that the lessor buys.
